titles.title: Commission on the Advancement of Women in the Science and Engineering Work Forces Act
To establish the Commission on the Advancement of Women in the Science and Engineering Work Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/26/1996--Introduced. Commission on the Advancement of Women in the Science and Engineering Work Forces Act - Establishes the Commission on the Advancement of Women in the Science and Engineering Work Forces to study and report to the Congress on the recruitment, retention, and advancement of women in the science and engineering work forces. Authorizes appropriations.
